title: Southern Addiction Mint Julep
directions: Muddle simple syrup and mint leaves together in a large glass; add ice. Pour in peach-flavored bourbon liqueur, peach schnapps, club soda, and sweet tea. Stir well.
ingredients: 1/2 cup crushed ice, or as needed
2 fluid ounces peach-flavored bourbon liqueur (such as Southern Comfort )
2 1/2 fluid ounces sweet tea, or as needed
